addRequiredSigner(bytes32,address).details: Used when a signer's wallet address becomes available after document creation

params.signer: Address to add as required signer

params.parentDocumentId: Parent document ID (0x0 if no parent/template)
params.requiredSigners: Addresses that must sign (empty = any can sign)
params.title: Human-readable title

returns.creator: Document creator
returns.parentDocumentId: Parent document ID (0x0 if no parent)
returns.title: Document title

getDocumentSignatureHash(bytes32,address.details: Frontend can use this to construct the signing message

returns._0: Array of document IDs in that category
True if wallet has at least one document in category

returns.signedAt: Timestamp when signed (0 if not signed)

returns.voidedAt: Timestamp when voided (0 if not voided)

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

signDocument(bytes32,bytes).details: Verifies that msg.sender signed the EIP-712 typed data

params.signature: EIP-712 signature (65 bytes: r, s, v)

signDocumentFor(bytes32,address).details: Maintains backward compatibility for delegated signing

voidDocument(bytes32,string).details: Only document creator can void. Voided documents cannot be signed.

addRequiredSigner(bytes32,address).notice: Add a required signer to an existing document

getDocumentSignatureHash(bytes32,address.notice: Get the EIP-712 hash for signing a document

hasDocumentCategory(string).notice: Check if wallet has any document in a category

isDocumentSigned(address,bytes32).notice: Check if address has signed a document

isDocumentVoided(bytes32).notice: Check if a document is voided

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

signDocument(bytes32,bytes).notice: Sign a document with EIP-712 signature verification

signDocumentFor(bytes32,address).notice: Sign a document (called by offering on behalf of investor, no crypto verification)

verifyDocumentSignature(bytes32,address,.notice: Verify an EIP-712 signature for a document
